_source: External list of 250 community/underground radios (analyzed by Musical Expert)
_comment: Curated subset: relevant to LAF, no duplicates with EXTERNAL_STATION_CONFIGS. Project owner / continuation agent: merge into built-in list or add via API. See CANDIDATE_STATIONS_INGEST.md.
